actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 (to provide that an area is deemed an area of substantial unemployment for purposes of such title if such area has a rate of unemployment of at least 6 percentum.

summary.text: Revises the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act by providing that an area is deemed an area of substantial unemployment for the purposes of the Act if such area has a 6 percent unemployment rate at any time during the 30-day period preceding the date of an application for assistance under the Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 (to provide that an area is deemed an area of substantial unemployment for purposes of such title if such area has a rate of unemployment of at least 6 percentum.
